00036 # generate application window
00037 
00038 class Application(tkinter.tix.Tk):
00039     """Main app window. Everything starts here.
00040        Keeps the main widgets (menu, upper and right toolbar, console, canvas, XML editor, etc.
00041        Initialises or uses the (common) settings object, the state object and the model object."""
00042     def __init__(self, settings, model, state):
00043         tkinter.tix.Tk.__init__(self)
00044         # load registered settings and default empty state (menu)
00045         
00046         self.settings = settings
00047         self.model    = model
00048         self.state    = state
00049         
00050         self.xmlPaths=None  # ????
00051         self.modulePaths=[] # other directories to import modules from ????
00052 
00053         self.xmlprojfiles={"trunk":    None,
00054                            "geometry": None,
00055                            "mesh":     None} # ???? maybe I should move this 
00056 
00057         self.projState = None # if the app starts with a new project, no project, a previously opened one, etc ... TODO
00058                               # with influence on self.settings (some menu entries have to be disabled with respect to
00059                               # the settings
00060 
00061         self.widgets = None # holds all widgets in an unified way - maybe in a clear to follow tree ????
00062 
00063         self.menuBar=None
00064 
00065         self.upperFrame=None # general buttons like zoom, new, save, entity hierarchy, open editor (xml, python),
00066 
00067         self.canvasFrame=None # left toolbox + cad widget
00068         self.notebook=None
00069         self.leftFrame=None
00070         self.DrawingArea=None
00071         self.XMLeditor=None
00072 
00073         self.lowerConsole=None # with tabs possibility
00074         self.lowerLabelFrame=None # has priority when determining the windows size
00075         self.lowerLabel=None
00076         self.lowerlabelstr=[]
00077 
00078         self.AppTitle=tkinter.StringVar()
00079         self.AppTitle.set("")
00080 
00081         self.readXML() # ??? - settings ???
00082         self.createApp()
00083 
00084     def createApp(self):
00085         self.menuBar=GUI.widgets.menu.MenuToolbar(self,
00086                                                   self.settings["menuXMLPath"],
00087                                                   self.settings["menuIconsPath"])
00088 
00089         self.upperFrame=GUI.widgets.uptoolbox.UpperToolbox(self,
00090                                                            self.settings["upperToolBoxXMLPath"],
00091                                                            self["upperToolBoxIconsPath"])
00092 
00093         self.notebook=tkinter.tix.NoteBook(self)
00094         self.notebook.pack(side="top", fill="both", expand="yes")
00095 
00096         # more like testing purpose
00097         self.lowerLabelFrame=tkinter.Frame(self, borderwidth=0)
00098         self.lowerLabelFrame.pack(side="top", fill="x")
00099         self.lowerlabelstr.append(tkinter.StringVar())
00100         self.lowerLabel=tkinter.Label(self.lowerLabelFrame, textvariable=self.lowerlabelstr[0], relief="sunken")
00101         self.lowerLabel.pack(side="bottom", fill="x")
00102 
00103         # bindings
00104 
00105         self.geometry('%sx%s+0+0' % self.maxsize())
00106 
00107         self.title(self.AppTitle.get())
00108         self.update_idletasks()
00109         self.mainloop()
00110 
00111     def initDrawingArea(self): # should be called after the other widgets are initialiazed.
00112 
00113         self.notebook.add(name="canvas", label="Drawing Area")
00114 
00115         self.DrawingArea=GUI.widgets.canvas.DrawingArea(self, os.path.join(self.basedir, "etc/gui/canvas.xml")) # add setting to settings instance
00116         self.DrawingArea.pack(fill="both", expand="yes", in_=self.notebook.canvas)
00117         self.update_idletasks()
00118 
00119         self.DrawingArea.bind("<Motion>", self.__cb_lowerlabel, add="+")
00120 
00121         self.notebook.add(name="xml", label="XML")
00122         self.XMLeditor=GUI.widgets.XMLeditor.XMLeditor(self, os.path.join(self.basedir, "etc/gui/XMLeditor.xml")) # add setting to settings instance
00123         self.XMLeditor.pack(fill="both", expand="yes", in_=self.notebook.xml)
00124         self.XMLeditor.insert(tkinter.END, 
00125                               self.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].toprettyxml(indent = '   ', 
00126                                                                            encoding=self.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].encoding))
00127 
00128 
00129     def readXML(self):
00130         self.xmlPaths=minidom.parse(os.path.join(self.basedir, "etc/paths.xml"))
00131 
00132         for i in self.xmlPaths.getElementsByTagName('ModPath'):
00133             self.modulePaths.append(i.firstChild.data)
00134 
00135         self.lwd=os.path.join(self.basedir, self.xmlPaths.getElementsByTagName("LastWorkingDir")[0].firstChild.data)
00136 
00137     def __cb_lowerlabel(self, event): # to be transformed in a full class widget
00138         self.lowerlabelstr[0].set("x_int = %d, y_int = %d" % (event.x, event.y))
00139 
00140 settingsObj = settings()
00141 modelObj    = model() 
00142 stateObj    = state()
00143 
00144 root   = Application(settings, model, state)
